website_summaries.verdict: Good overview of real estate exam basics. Latest info is included in this test prep book.
pros: Offers info relevant to the exams administered in all 50 states
Includes 4 extensive practice exams with realistic questions
Includes thorough, helpful discussions of many different real estate concepts
cons: Doesn't provide enough detail for some people, especially when dealing with certain states

customer_reviews.title: Real estate License Exam For Dummies
customer_reviews.text: I passed the state exam on my first attempt but I will recommend that you get right to the nitty gritty! Immediately start taking the practice exams and keep taking them again and again and again and those exams are going to kick your butt! To be honest the state exam was no picnic either. I think the state exam tries to kick your butt just as hard as these practice exams but if it wasn’t for those practice exams kicking my butt there isn’t anyway I would of passed. Thank you John A. Yoegel for writing the book! I am on my way to that first million dollars! Whoo hoo!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Jefferies

customer_reviews.title: A good starting point
customer_reviews.text: After finishing this book, I Can say I enjoyed the book, although I’ve yet to take the test, I l’m using this book as only one of multiple sources to help me pass. I found each chapter well laid out and the points well explained, some multiple times, but that’s a positive as repetition helps in memorization, so I thought of it as a positive. At the end of each chapter it had practice questions with complete explanations as to why that particular answer was correct as well as why each incorrect answer was not correct. I found this book well worth the money for someone who’s new to the exam process and looking to start from the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read and comprehend!
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking to start a career in real estate and this book is a great starting point. I'm 40yrs old and I'm not as good as I used to be at studying all night, plus I'm a wife and a mom. This book is not long and complicated and gets right to the nitty gritty. I would definitely recommend this book for anyone old or young looking to get into real estate.
customer_reviews.author: Jhana D.

customer_reviews.title: Study, study, study!!!
customer_reviews.text: This book helps understand terminology easier than the school did. It also helps realize other things a lot more simpler as well! I used this on top of my school book to study. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Love2shopchic

customer_reviews.title: Save your money & hit YouTube
customer_reviews.text: Found it dry- hard to stay focused on material. It's not the most interesting of topics but I was looking for tricks to remember things- not in this book. Save your money & hit YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: I passed first time because of this book
customer_reviews.text: I read this book cover to cover and then reviewed key concepts and passed the California exam on my first try. In addition, I watched PrepAgent videos and bought a question bank from Chamberlain. I would not have passed without with book, I can't recommend it enough. Do the practice exams in the back of the book!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The math part is great. I would definitely recommend learning the calculation part ...
customer_reviews.text: The math part is great. I would definitely recommend learning the calculation part from this book, it was enough to do the calculations on the test. It is also entertaining and fun to read. Otherwise i would use it only as supplemental to your state real estate books. It doesn't really help you to pass state portion of the exam. It helps a little w national portion of the test.
customer_reviews.author: Alley B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The answer to this question is WRONG. How many others? The answer is A. You might wanna fix that
customer_reviews.author: PurpleTwizzlers

customer_reviews.title: Great Book
customer_reviews.text: Just started reading it and I am impressed. It is clear and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: ladyef

customer_reviews.title: I passed because of this Book! NEED to purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I will first start off by saying I never write reviews. With that being said, this book saved me from having to fail again! After my fourth time failing the real estate psi exam I was at my wits end and decided to purchase this book because what was the worst that could happen at this point. After studying and reading this book, I passed the Exam! I honestly have to say this book is the only thing that helped me pass! ** Definitely written more towards the National part of the Exam
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: Student is studying hard now getting ready to take exam in a few months... we will see!
customer_reviews.author: R. Castro

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great and useful book! Helped me pass the national portion of the exam and a lot of the questions were in this book.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki guarrasi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really helped with real estate terminology that is poorly explained in the textbooks.
customer_reviews.author: alyssa williams

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and written...
customer_reviews.text: As an instructor of real estate courses, I'm recommending this book for students need feel the need for extra help preparing for their exam. The "For Dummies" series rarely disappoints. The books are well designed from a learning perspective and this one is quite thorough in terms of topics covered.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I used this book to gain a basic understanding of Real Estate before I take the class. The book is very helpful and easy to follow. I highly recommend it for anyone interested in becoming an agent.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Valiant

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend taking her exam. She failed, but that’s not the book’s fault. I read the book and was able to answer her test questions correctly so I feel it can adequately assist anyone prepping for their exam.
customer_reviews.author: Meg.

customer_reviews.title: Best book for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This book is the best since the author knows what he is talking about. This is a must have book to study before taking real estate classes. I highly recommend this book.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it says it's for your state. Don't go by it's for any state
customer_reviews.text: It's ok,but it's not for new jersey. Every state is different. With their rules and regulations.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Q.

customer_reviews.title: ... so I definitely found this book to be a great investment.
customer_reviews.text: As a real estate investor just needed to be freshened up on some terms so I definitely found this book to be a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: ATIZZY

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but good test taking skills
customer_reviews.text: Book wasn’t bad it just is generally a book about how to study for your real estate exam. Kinda vague but it did help me gain some insight on Strategy and test taking skills. I was just looking for something different.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne

customer_reviews.title: Great Help!!!
customer_reviews.text: This book made studying for my Real Estate exam much less intimidating! I feel like I will be ready for the national portion of the test the second I walk into my required classes. Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mariel Lynne Waite

customer_reviews.title: Great study tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing book! It helped me past my real estate license exam. It explains the topics really well and the practice tests are really helpful. I definitely recommend getting this book as an extra study tool
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it was helpful
customer_reviews.text: I thought that I could learn a lot from this book for my real estate exam, turns out that it was an overload of information and wasn't very easy to understand. It was also an overwhelming amount of information.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Easy read for study guide
customer_reviews.text: Great reference / study book for anyone interested in real estate
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.text: Perfect real estate book but everyone should know that real estate is different in every state with different rules and regulations.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Chema

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Extremely helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I am currently studying for my real estate exam and this has been very helpful to me, in addition to the book that was provided through my course.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: I would say it is a good resource to have
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my friend who was going to take the real estate liscense exam and he used it and passed! I would say it is a good resource to have!
customer_reviews.author: Ciara K Carrington

customer_reviews.title: A Very Understandable Book Filled With Great Information.
customer_reviews.text: John Yoegel makes all the concepts very understandable. The best book on the market for passing your examine. And should you ever have a chance to take his courses in person, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Borrero

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: The book cover has bent not the worst thing in the world but I won't be using this saler again.
customer_reviews.author: Charmane  reid

customer_reviews.title: bought this book prior to taking my Washington state Brokers ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this book prior to taking my Washington state Brokers Test (national and state portions) and FAILED with flying colors. this book did not prepare me in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Real Estate License Exams For Dummies with Online Practice Tests (For Dummies (Lifestyle))
